title: Perfect 10
lyrics:
Light Camera Action Uh
Modeun ge da wanbyeoghae
Hit the button and push record
Day night galiji anh-a nan
Ogam-i ikkeuneun geudaelo chaj-aga

Feels real neukkim-eul ttalaga

Neol dalm-eun hyang-giga neomchyeona



Ne mam-eun tumyeonghan sagag-ui jag-eun peuleim

Geu an-e damgo sip-eun

Ojig dan hanaui pisacheya nan

Dalkomhan jeo bich-eul jomyeong sam-aseo nan

Neoleul gidaligo iss-eo Yeah



Kkaman nae nundongjaleul Close up

Nae modeun geol da Close up

Soljighan nae mam-eul jogeum deo gakkai

Dah-eul deus gakkai



I'll be your perfect 10, 10, 10

Be your perfect 10, 10, 10

Modeun Cut-i 10, 10, 10

Ne pum-e naleul gadul ttae

Deohal nawi eobs-i Perfect



Gieog-ui pilleum-eul gam-aseo

Hamkkehan sungan sog-ui naleul dol-a bwa

So unreal eojjeomyeon ileohge

Il bun il cho da neoman bwa



Neoui geu budeuleoun misoneun naegen Flash

Geu bich-e balg-ajineun

Ojig neol ttaleuneun pisacheya nan

Chogchoghan bis-sog-eul hamkke geodneun geu bam

Ulin geulimcheoleom meosjyeo Yeah



Saekkaman nundongjaleul Close up

Nae modeun geol da Close up

Soljighan nae mam-eul jogeum deo gakkai

Boyeojugo sip-eo



I'll be your perfect 10, 10, 10

Be your perfect 10, 10, 10

Modeun Cut-i 10, 10, 10

Ne pum-e naleul gadul ttae

Deohal nawi eobs-i Perfect



Neon jigeum i sungan-eul hanado jeoldae nohchiji ma

Nog-abeolil geosman gat-eun pyojeong

Pyeongsowan daleun Kiss-ui tteollim Feel brand new

Nae modeun sungandeul-eul neoege olos-i namgyeojulge



Maekkeuleoun meolisgyeol-eul Close up

Wonhaneun geol da Close up

Hayahge tteollineun sumgyeol geu hanado

Modu neol hyanghaess-eo



I'll be your perfect 10, 10, 10

Be your perfect 10, 10, 10

Modeun Cut-i 10, 10, 10

Hamkke han modeun sungan-i

Deohal nawi eobs-i Perfect perfect
